Alis
Table of Contents

Namespace Alis.Core.Physic.Collision.ContactSystem

Classes

Contact

The class manages contact between two shapes. A contact exists for each overlapping AABB in the broad-phase (except if filtered). Therefore a contact object may exist that has no contact points.

ContactEdge

A contact edge is used to connect bodies and contacts together in a contact graph where each body is a node and each contact is an edge. A contact edge belongs to a doubly linked list maintained in each attached body. Each contact has two contact nodes, one for each attached body.

ContactManager

The contact manager class

Structs

ContactFeature

The features that intersect to form the contact point This must be 4 bytes or less.

ContactId

Contact ids to facilitate warm starting.

Enums

ContactFeatureType

The contact feature type enum

ContactSetting

The contact flags enum

ContactType

The contact type enum
